summary.high_level: Designed a standalone CLI tool (sb) to handle scene and session commits, JSON validation, and index rebuilding. Establishes minimal 3-capability commit agent contract.
key_decisions: Use standalone CLI (not embedded in Codex or project repo).
Agent contract limited to grounding (read), commit (write), and index/validation (maintain).
Projects remain structured locally; second-brain references them via Project Map scenes.
Adopt Intake → Draft → Publish conceptual pipeline for future automation.
summary.architectural_shift: Transition from structured-manual workflow to automatable commit-layer infrastructure.

nodes.label: Commit agent contract (3-capability model)
nodes.definition: Minimal agent interface: grounding access (read project docs), commit access (write scenes/session artifacts), and maintenance access (reindex + validate).

nodes.label: Standalone CLI commit pattern
nodes.description: A local-first command-line tool that writes scene/session JSON, validates structure, and maintains indexes without requiring database infrastructure.

nodes.label: Project map grounding model
nodes.definition: Graph node defining repo location, canonical documents, and grounding order for agents before reasoning about a project.
